com.p6spy.engine.spy.appender

Interface P6Logger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchFileLogger, FileLogger, FormattedLogger, P6SpyLogger, Slf4JLogger, StdoutLogger

    public interface P6Logger

    • Method Detail

      • logSQL

        void logSQL(int connectionId,
          String now,
          long elapsed,
          Category category,
          String prepared,
          String sql)
        Logs the SQL.
        Parameters:
        connectionId - connection identifier.
        now - current time.
        elapsed -
        category - the category to be used for logging.
        prepared - the prepared statement to be logged.
        sql - the SQL to be logged.

      • logException

        void logException(Exception e)
        Logs the stacktrace of the exception.
        Parameters:
        e - exception holding the stacktrace to be logged.

      • logText

        void logText(String text)
        Logs the text.
        Parameters:
        text - to be logged

      • isCategoryEnabled

        boolean isCategoryEnabled(Category category)
        Parameters:
        category - the category to be evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if category is enabled. Otherwise returns false
